generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings, curving into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, bordered by a curb and some vegetation.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and bushes along the sides of the road and in the background, indicating abundant vegetation.
- terrain: There is grass and some soil visible along the roadside and in the median strip, which qualifies as terrain.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees, appearing overcast and gray.
- person: A person is visible on the right side of the road, riding a bicycle, which qualifies as a person.
- rider: The person on the bicycle is classified as a rider.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the road, being ridden by a person.
- car: A car is partially visible on the far left side of the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the left side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a "No Entry" sign and a "Zone" sign, mounted on poles.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic lights and traffic signs.
- fence: A fence is visible along the right side of the road, running parallel to the road.
- building: A building is partially visible in the background on the right side, behind the trees and fence.
